org.apache.hama.commons.math

Class CrossEntropy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.commons.math.Function
      • org.apache.hama.commons.math.DoubleDoubleFunction
        • org.apache.hama.commons.math.CrossEntropy

  • public class CrossEntropy
extends DoubleDoubleFunction
    The cross entropy cost function. 
     cost(t, y) = - t * log(y) - (1 - t) * log(1 - y),
 where t denotes the target value, y denotes the estimated value.
